XData.name: ProductionDefinition
XData.Data: <Production Name="Demo.PEX.Production.RemoteBusinessOperation" LogGeneralTraceEvents="false"> <Description></Description> <ActorPoolSize>2</ActorPoolSize> <Item Name="Demo.PEX.TickerService" Category="" ClassName="Demo.PEX.TickerService" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" Comment="" LogTraceEvents="false" Schedule=""> <Setting Target="Host" Name="TargetConfigName">InterSystems.Demo.PEX.BusinessOperation</Setting> <Setting Target="Host" Name="RemoteMessagePackageName">InterSystems.Demo.PEX</Setting> </Item> <Item Name="InterSystems.Demo.PEX.BusinessOperation" Category="" ClassName="EnsLib.PEX.BusinessOperation" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="true" Comment="" LogTraceEvents="false" Schedule=""> <Setting Target="Host" Name="%gatewayPort">55555</Setting> <Setting Target="Host" Name="%gatewayExtraClasspaths">C:\PEXDemo\DemoPEX.exe</Setting> <Setting Target="Host" Name="%remoteClassname">InterSystems.Demo.PEX.BusinessOperation</Setting> </Item> </Production>
